house_listing.house_description: This 1 level single family home built in 1996 has 4 bedroom(s), 5 full bath(s)/1 half bath(s) , 5 car garage and approximately 6064 square feet of living area. Rooms include den, dining room, bonus room, master bedroom. Features include view, private pool, private spa, patio, fireplace, air conditioning, storage space.
house_listing.agent_name: Ann Laurie Moore Ann Laurie Moore

residential_listing_-_feature_details.fireplace: Den, Family Room, Living Room, Master Bedroom
